LanguageData.Malnutrition.label: 영양실조
LanguageData.Malnutrition.description: Abnormally low body fat and weight, typically caused by lack of food. Malnutrition is always very unpleasant, but its initial effects are mild. Without food, though, a malnourished creature will waste away, losing muscle mass and capacities. Malnutrition ends with death. Upon re-feeding malnutrition naturally recovers over time. Malnourished creatures have larger appetites than normal.
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.trivial.label: 사소함
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.minor.label: 가벼움
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.moderate.label: 진행됨
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.severe.label: 심각함
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.extreme.label: 극심함
